duck: Troubleshooting, a form of problem solving, often applied to repair failed products or processes.
Medical diagnosis, the process of attempting to determine or identify a possible disease or disorder, and to the opinion reached by this process

Formative assessment, or "diagnotic testing", is a range of formal and informal assessment procedures employed by teachers during the learning process in order to modify teaching and learning activities to improve student attainment.
Problem solving, using generic or ad hoc methods, in an orderly manner, for finding solutions to specific problems
Diagnostic imaging, the technique and process used to create images of the human body for clinical purposes or medical science.
diagnosis definition: the art or act of identifying a disease from its signs and symptoms.

wiki.text:
<!--what is this? a disambiguation page or term?--> 'Diagnosis' is the
identification of the nature and cause of anything. Diagnosis is used in many
different disciplines with variations in the use of logics, analytics, and
experience to determine the [[causality|cause and effect]] relationships. In
systems engineering and computer science, diagnosis is typically used to
determine the causes of symptoms, mitigations for problems and solutions to iss-
ues.<ref>http://www.etymonline.com/index.php?term=diagnosis</ref><ref>http://gr-
egstanleyandassociates.com/whitepapers/FaultDiagnosis/faultdiagnosis.htm</ref>
wiki.title: Diagnosis
